title: Create Account Portal Form
description: Design a form for the customer portal to display basic account information, including fields such as account name, address, and contact details. Ensure the Account Number field is included and set to read-only.

title: Configure Basic Form in Portal
description: Set up and expose the newly created Account Portal form as a Basic Form within the customer portal, ensuring it's accessible through the portal UI.

title: Add Top Menu Navigation Link
description: Integrate a link to the Account Portal form in the top menu link set of the customer portal for easy access by users.

title: Create 'Update Account' Web Role
description: Define a new Web Role named 'Update Account' in the customer portal system, which will have specific permissions related to updating account information.

title: Set Table Permissions for Account Updates
description: Configure table permissions that allow updates to the Account table, ensuring that these permissions are based on the parent value settings for security and integrity.

title: Assign Permissions to Web Role
description: Link the configured table permissions for account updates to the 'Update Account' Web Role, ensuring users with this role can perform updates as intended.
